abstract.abstracttext:
To compare two intraocular irrigating solutions, Balanced Salt
Solution
Plus (Balanced Salt Solution Plus) versus Lactated
Ringer's
(Ringer), for the preservation of corneal integrity after phacoemulsification.

110
patients
undergoing phacoemulsification were randomised to either Balanced Salt Solution Plus (_POP_) or Ringer (_POP_) as the irrigating solution. Patients were examined at baseline and at 1, 8, 15, 30 and _POFT_ postoperatively. Evaluations included specular microscopy to evaluate endothelial cell
density
and endothelial cell size variability , and corneal pachymetry for central corneal thickness measurement.

Groups were well balanced regarding baseline Endothelial Cell Density, Cell Size Variability and Corneal Thickness _PVAL_. There was no statistically significant difference between Endothelial Cell Density reduction in group Balanced Salt Solution Plus
13.1 +/ 2.0%
and Ringer
9.2 +/ 1.9%
_PVAL_ at day 60 or in any study visit. There was no statistically significant difference between Cell Size Variability increase in group Balanced Salt Solution Plus 23.0 Â +/ 3.0% and Ringer 20.2 Â +/ 4.0% _PVAL_ at day 60 or in any study visit. Corneal Thickness was significantly increased _PVAL_ at 1, 8, 15 and _POFT_ postoperatively, returning to baseline at _POFT_ in both groups. There was no significant difference in Corneal Thickness increase in both groups at any visit. Interestingly, there were statistically significant correlations between Endothelial Cell Density loss and phacoemulsification time _PVAL_ and Endothelial Cell Density loss and irrigation solution volume _PVAL_ in the Ringer group, but not in the Balanced Salt Solution Plus group.

Ringers solution was similar to Balanced Salt Solution Plus for corneal preservation in atraumatic cataract surgery. However, our study demonstrates that there is a trend towards lower postoperative endothelial cell density for surgeries with longer phacoemulsification time and higher irrigation volumes if Ringer is used. Trial registration number NCT00801358.

body.title: Comparison of corneal changes after phacoemulsification using BSS Plus versus Lactated Ringer's irrigating solution: a prospective randomised trial.
